lead_paragraph: Janine Weber signed with the New York Riveters of the National Women’s Hockey League, a new competitor for the established but nonpaying Canadian Women’s Hockey League.

headline.main: Women’s Pro League Offering Pay Signs Its First Player
headline.print_headline: New Women’s Pro Hockey League Signs Its First Player

snippet: Janine Weber signed with the New York Riveters of the National Women’s Hockey League, a new competitor for the established but nonpaying Canadian Women’s Hockey League.
